name: BOUNDLESS (itch) (alextomkow)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the USC MEGA "Newbies and Vets" game jam. 

Theme: "Boundless".

Survive and endure the worst of both worlds.

CREDITS: 

A GAME BY - Sheehan Ahmed, Aidan Takami, Taygh Atwal, Alan Karbachinsky, Steven Atha, Jack Bailey, and Alex Tomkow.

WITH MUSIC AND ADDITIONAL SOUND BY - Zong Chiang.
